name: Group 4 - Spellemental
description:
Spellemental is a competitive puzzle game where players take turns to select tiles, the more tiles the more damage you will do to the opposing player.

How To Play

- Select a tile, select a tile next to the last selected (either horizontal or vertical)

-Continue to select until you have largest combo possible

-Press End Turn button to damage the opposing player

-Player 2 then repeats steps above

-End of game is when one of the players no longer has any HP left.
The game is work in progress so there is plenty left to add to make the game obvious when it is over, easier to understand when starting off, balance changes and more additions.

Created by:

Group Manager - Bethany Cowle

Programmers - Ben Carter, Victor Sicoe

Designers - Bethany Cowle, Caleb Guppy
